alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Flagler, western St. Johns, eastern Marion, Putnam and central Clay Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Kingsley to 7 miles east of Moss Bluff. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Crescent City, Interlachen, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Fruit Cove, Salt Springs and Andalusia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
